channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My 90-year-old parents’ neighbor is friendly, nice and, I suspect, a predator. Am I wrong?
item.description: “He tells my parents to ignore me when I suggest that it’s time to look into senior-living situations.”

item.title: ‘He threw a book at me’: Why IRMAA surcharges make seniors on Medicare so mad
item.description: Letters will go out soon for those who will have to pay extra next year for their Part B and D premiums

item.title: SEC, Shift4 Payments Reach Disclosure-Violation Settlement
item.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission reached a $750,000 settlement with Shift4 Payments, resolving allegations that the payments-technology company ...

item.title: A Bond Selloff Is Rocking the World. You Might Want to Take the Other Side.
item.description: A rare ‘bear steepening’ trade is pressuring governments and worrying investors.

item.title: Judge Rules American Airlines Breached 401(k) Duties by Encouraging ESG Investing
item.description: The company’s retirement plan was found to favor socially conscious goals over financial returns.

item.title: ‘I can afford to be generous’: How much should I give my stepdaughter for her wedding gift? I want to be fair.
Who Pays to Rebuild California When Insurance Falls Short? Everyone Else
item.description: Many Los Angeles-area residents devastated by fire will lean on Washington and charitable aid—and draw on their own savings.

item.title: The Top Stock Funds of 2024
item.description: The Magnificent Seven tech stocks and big AI players drove double-digit gains at many large-cap mutual funds. The top fund returned 51.8%.

item.title: Private equity in 401(k) plans? ‘Highly risky’ for the average investor.
item.description: The private-equity industry wants more access to retirement accounts.

item.title: My sister made frequent withdrawals from the ‘bank of Mom and Dad.’ Now our family is torn apart. What can I do?
item.description: “My sister did nothing because she was a girl, and my brother was too young to help.”
